title: Tsuyokute New Saga (WN) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Calm Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Clever Protagonist   Demon Lord   Demons   Dragons   Elves   Fantasy World   Hard-Working Protagonist   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Heroes   Male Protagonist   Second Chance   Sentient Objects   Sword And Magic   Weak to Strong
author: Masayuki Abe
description: Kyle and his band of suicide squad head straight into the Demon King’s castle to put an end to his schemes. With Kyle losing his right arm and leg, he vanquishes the Demon King at the cost of his team and his loved one… Slowly dying as he bled out, he saw a dark crystal in the area, deciding to grab it. A blinding light surrounded him… and somehow he finds himself on a bed in a familiar room.>
